body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<wps:Execute xmlns:wps="http://www.opengis.net/wps/1.0.0" service="WPS" version="2.0.0">
    <p0:Identifier xmlns:p0="http://www.opengis.net/ows/1.1">org.n52.gfz.riesgos.algorithm.impl.SystemReliabilitySingleProcess</p0:Identifier>
    <wps:DataInputs>
        <wps:Input>
            <p0:Identifier xmlns:p0="http://www.opengis.net/ows/1.1">intensity</p0:Identifier>
            <p0:Title xmlns:p0="http://www.opengis.net/ows/1.1">intensity</p0:Title>
            <p0:Abstract xmlns:p0="http://www.opengis.net/ows/1.1"></p0:Abstract>
            <wps:Reference p1:href="https://riesgos.52north.org/shakemap_example.xml" 
                xmlns:p1="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" method="GET" mimeType="text/xml">
            </wps:Reference>
        </wps:Input>
        <wps:Input>
            <p0:Identifier xmlns:p0="http://www.opengis.net/ows/1.1">country</p0:Identifier>
            <p0:Title xmlns:p0="http://www.opengis.net/ows/1.1">country</p0:Title>
            <p0:Abstract xmlns:p0="http://www.opengis.net/ows/1.1"></p0:Abstract>
            <wps:Data>
                <wps:LiteralData>chile</wps:LiteralData>
            </wps:Data>
        </wps:Input>
        <wps:Input>
            <p0:Identifier xmlns:p0="http://www.opengis.net/ows/1.1">hazard</p0:Identifier>
            <p0:Title xmlns:p0="http://www.opengis.net/ows/1.1">hazard</p0:Title>
            <p0:Abstract xmlns:p0="http://www.opengis.net/ows/1.1"></p0:Abstract>
            <wps:Data>
                <wps:LiteralData>earthquake</wps:LiteralData>
            </wps:Data>
        </wps:Input>
    </wps:DataInputs>
    <wps:ResponseForm>
        <wps:ResponseDocument storeExecuteResponse="false" status="false">
            <wps:Output mimeType="application/vnd.geo+json" asReference="false">
                <p0:Identifier xmlns:p0="http://www.opengis.net/ows/1.1">damage_consumer_areas</p0:Identifier>
            </wps:Output>
        </wps:ResponseDocument>
    </wps:ResponseForm>
</wps:Execute>
